title: Beyond Goodbye
overview: Saeko suddenly loses her fiancé Yusuke in a traffic accident. As she tries to overcome her grief, she meets Naruse, a man who strangely reminds her of Yusuke. Little did she know that Naruse had received Yusuke's heart a few months prior to their encounter—a heart still in love and holding all the memories of Yusuke and Saeko's relationship.
